name: lit-html-parcel
description: simple demo lit-html with parcel HMR
author: kwmiebach
privateComment: private, when set to true, prevents accidental publication

scripts.build: yarn run dist-clean && parcel build index.html
scripts.e2e: yarn run build && yarn run start-server-and-test

scriptsComment.run-mocha: Only used by e2e, needs http-server-dist.
e2e: The parameter http://host:port is necessary for start-server-and-test and passed to http-server-dist but most probably not used.
The last parameter run-mocha runs the run-mocha script, no 'yarn run ...' necessary'
